title: Pairing Kari Display
content: I´m trying to practice typeface pairing skills, and now that I happened to see this beautiful Kari Display [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/kari-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131073919/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/kari-display/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/kari-display/") I decided to find a pair for it. But I can not decide, or should I say I can not see, which typeface would make a good pair for it. What do you say?
author: Miro

comments.content: Gill sans light? Is it completely wrong?
No I think you're on the right track pairing it with a more restrained and neutral sans-serif.
@ Nick, well don´t they look happy together :-D Thanks for the pictorial answer.
